by.epamtr.totalizator.service

Interface AdminOperationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminOperation

    public interface AdminOperationService
    Interface contains methods that are required to provide administrator's work with the application.
    Author:
    Andrey Kryshtapovich

    • Method Detail

      • createNewGameCupoun

        boolean createNewGameCupoun(GameCupounDTO gameCupounDTO)
                     throws ServiceException
        Creates new game coupon in the system.
        Parameters:
        gameCupounDTO - GameCupounDTO object that represents new game coupon.
        Returns:
        true if new game coupon was created successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if creating of new game coupon fails.

      • createNewEvent

        boolean createNewEvent(EventDTO eventDTO)
                throws ServiceException

        Parameters:
        eventDTO - EventDTO object that represents new event.
        Returns:
        true if new event was created successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if creating of new event fails.

      • matchEventAndGame

        boolean matchEventAndGame(java.lang.String gameCupounId,
                          java.lang.String eventId)
                   throws ServiceException
        Matches event to a particular game coupon. Event will be associated with particular game coupon.
        Parameters:
        gameCupounId - String representing game coupon's Id in the system.
        eventId - String representing event's Id in the system.
        Returns:
        true if event was matched to the game coupon successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if matching fails.

        Returns:
        true if event was updated successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if update fails.

      • updateGame

        boolean updateGame(GameCupounDTO gameDTO)
            throws ServiceException
        Updates information about particular game coupon in the system.
        Parameters:
        gameDTO - GameCupounDTO object that represents game coupon with up to date information about it.
        Returns:
        true if game coupon was updated successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if update fails.

      • unmatchEventAndGame

        boolean unmatchEventAndGame(java.lang.String eventId)
                     throws ServiceException
        Unmatches event and the particular game coupon.
        Parameters:
        eventId - String representing event's Id in the system.
        Returns:
        true if event was unmatched successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if unmatching fails.

      • deleteEvent

        boolean deleteEvent(java.lang.String eventId)
             throws ServiceException
        Deletes particular event from the system.
        Parameters:
        eventId - even's Id in the system.
        Returns:
        true if event was deleted successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if deleting fails.

      • closeGameCoupon

        int closeGameCoupon(java.lang.String gameCouponId)
             throws ServiceException
        Calculates the prize for bets that won in the particular drawing. Changes status of the game coupon representing particular drawing to closed or cancelled.
        Parameters:
        gameCouponId - Id of the particular game coupon in the data storage.
        Returns:
        int value representing the result : 1 - game coupon closed successfully. -3 - rollback occurred. -2 - game coupon was cancelled. -1 - error there are less than 15 events in the game coupon.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if closing game coupon fails.

      • getGamesInDevelopment

        java.util.List<GameCupoun> getGamesInDevelopment()
                                          throws ServiceException
        Gets the information about game coupons with status In developing.
        Returns:
        List of GameCupoun objects
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if obtaining information fails.

      • getResultDictionaryData
